review: Two months back, I took my baby boy to D&A Dental Clinic in Kodambakkam for his dental treatment. Dr. Aswini Ranjiga did an excellent job cleaning my child's teeth. I was pleasantly surprised to see my kid smiling and happy throughout the procedure, which was a great relief for me. I truly appreciate Dr. Ranjiga's handling of my child and the entire treatment process.
Strongly recommend! The Doctor is extremely professional, and the clinic maintains excellent hygiene standards. All the materials used are disposable and undergo thorough sterilisation.

I visited the doctor at her D&A dental Clinic, The detailed explanation of the dental problem and the friendly approach of the dentist were praiseworthy. I wholeheartedly recommend this place for any dental treatment.
